text: Approval for the apex monorail and over-the-wire percutaneous transluminal coronary angioplasty (ptca) catheters.  The device, as modified, is indicated for: 1) (balloon models 1.5  5.0 mm) balloon dilatation of the stenotic portion of a coronary artery or bypass graft stenosis for the purpose of improving myocardial perfusion; and 2) (balloon models 2.0  5.0 mm) for the post-delivery expansion of balloon expandable stents.
